00393 void InitHelpScreenSystem()
00394 {
00395       //set some values
00396       memset( &gHelpScreen, 0, sizeof( gHelpScreen ) );
00397 
00398       //set it up so we can enter the screen
00399       gfHelpScreenEntry = TRUE;
00400       gfHelpScreenExit = FALSE;
00401 
00402       gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage = -1;
00403 
00404       gHelpScreen.fHaveAlreadyBeenInHelpScreenSinceEnteringCurrenScreen = FALSE;
00405 }
00406 
00407 BOOLEAN ShouldTheHelpScreenComeUp( UINT8 ubScreenID, BOOLEAN fForceHelpScreenToComeUp )
00408 {
00409 
00410       //if the screen is being forsced to come up ( user pressed 'h' )
00411       if( fForceHelpScreenToComeUp )
00412       {
00413             //Set thefact that the user broughtthe help screen up
00414             gHelpScreen.fForceHelpScreenToComeUp = TRUE;
00415 
00416             goto HELP_SCREEN_SHOULD_COME_UP;
00417       }
00418 
00419       //if we are already in the help system, return true
00420       if( gHelpScreen.uiFlags & HELP_SCREEN_ACTIVE )
00421       {
00422             return( TRUE );
00423       }
00424 
00425       //has the player been in the screen before
00426       if( ( gHelpScreen.usHasPlayerSeenHelpScreenInCurrentScreen >> ubScreenID ) & 0x01 )
00427       {
00428             goto HELP_SCREEN_WAIT_1_FRAME;
00429       }
00430 
00431       //if we have already been in the screen, and the user DIDNT press 'h', leave
00432       if( gHelpScreen.fHaveAlreadyBeenInHelpScreenSinceEnteringCurrenScreen )
00433       {
00434             return( FALSE );
00435       }
00436 
00437       //should the screen come up, based on the users choice for it automatically coming up
00438 //    if( !( gHelpScreen.fHideHelpInAllScreens ) )
00439       {
00440 //          goto HELP_SCREEN_WAIT_1_FRAME;
00441       }
00442 
00443       //the help screen shouldnt come up
00444       return( FALSE );
00445 
00446 HELP_SCREEN_WAIT_1_FRAME:
00447 
00448       // we have to wait 1 frame while the screen renders
00449       if( gHelpScreen.bDelayEnteringHelpScreenBy1FrameCount < 2 )
00450       {
00451             gHelpScreen.bDelayEnteringHelpScreenBy1FrameCount += 1;
00452 
00453             UnmarkButtonsDirty( );
00454 
00455             return( FALSE );
00456       }
00457 
00458 HELP_SCREEN_SHOULD_COME_UP:
00459       
00460       //Record which screen it is
00461 
00462       //if its mapscreen
00463       if( ubScreenID == HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN )
00464       {
00465             //determine which screen it is ( is any mercs hired, did game just start )
00466             gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreen = HelpScreenDetermineWhichMapScreenHelpToShow();
00467       }
00468       else
00469       {
00470             gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreen = ubScreenID;
00471       }
00472 
00473       //mark it that the help screnn is enabled
00474       gHelpScreen.uiFlags |= HELP_SCREEN_ACTIVE;
00475 
00476       // reset
00477       gHelpScreen.bDelayEnteringHelpScreenBy1FrameCount = 0;
00478 
00479       return( TRUE );
00480 }
00481 
00482 
00483 void HelpScreenHandler()
00484 {
00485       //if we are just entering the help screen
00486       if( gfHelpScreenEntry )
00487       {
00488             //setup the help screen
00489             EnterHelpScreen();
00490 
00491             gfHelpScreenEntry = FALSE;
00492             gfHelpScreenExit = FALSE;
00493       }
00494 
00495       RestoreBackgroundRects();
00496 
00497 
00498       //get the mouse and keyboard inputs
00499       GetHelpScreenUserInput();
00500 
00501       //handle the help screen
00502       HandleHelpScreen();
00503 
00504       //if the help screen is dirty, re-render it
00505       if( gHelpScreen.ubHelpScreenDirty != HLP_SCRN_DRTY_LVL_NOT_DIRTY )
00506       {
00507             //temp
00508 //          gHelpScreen.ubHelpScreenDirty = HLP_SCRN_DRTY_LVL_REFRESH_ALL;
00509 
00510 
00511             RenderHelpScreen();
00512             gHelpScreen.ubHelpScreenDirty = HLP_SCRN_DRTY_LVL_NOT_DIRTY;
00513       }
00514 
00515       // render buttons marked dirty      
00516 //  MarkButtonsDirty( );
00517       RenderButtons( ); 
00518 
00519       SaveBackgroundRects( );
00520       RenderButtonsFastHelp();
00521 
00522       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
00523       EndFrameBufferRender();
00524 
00525       //if we are leaving the help screen
00526       if( gfHelpScreenExit )
00527       {
00528             gfHelpScreenExit = FALSE;
00529 
00530             gfHelpScreenEntry = TRUE;
00531 
00532             //exit mouse regions etc..
00533             ExitHelpScreen();
00534 
00535             //reset the helpscreen id
00536             gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreen = -1;
00537       }
00538 }
00539 
00540 BOOLEAN EnterHelpScreen()
00541 {
00542   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00543       UINT16 usPosX, usPosY;//, usWidth, usHeight;
00544 //    INT32 iStartLoc;
00545 //    CHAR16 zText[1024];
00546 
00547       //Clear out all the save background rects
00548       EmptyBackgroundRects( );
00549 
00550       
00551       UnmarkButtonsDirty( );
00552 
00553       // remeber if the game was paused or not ( so when we exit we know what to do )
00554       gHelpScreen.fWasTheGamePausedPriorToEnteringHelpScreen = gfGamePaused;
00555 
00556       //pause the game
00557       PauseGame( );
00558 
00559 
00560       //Determine the help screen size, based off the help screen
00561       SetSizeAndPropertiesOfHelpScreen();
00562 
00563       //Create a mouse region 'mask' the entrire screen
00564       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gHelpScreenFullScreenMask, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00565                                            gHelpScreen.usCursor, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK ); 
00566   MSYS_AddRegion( &gHelpScreenFullScreenMask ); 
00567 
00568 
00569       //Create the exit button
00570       if( gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons != 0 )
00571             usPosX = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX + HELP_SCREEN_EXIT_BTN_OFFSET_X + HELP_SCREEN_BUTTON_BORDER_WIDTH;
00572       else
00573             usPosX = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX + HELP_SCREEN_EXIT_BTN_OFFSET_X;
00574 
00575       usPosY = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY + HELP_SCREEN_EXIT_BTN_LOC_Y;
00576 
00577       //Create the exit buttons
00578       giExitBtnImage = LoadButtonImage("INTERFACE\\HelpScreen.sti", -1,0,4,2,6 );
00579 
00580       guiHelpScreenExitBtn = CreateIconAndTextButton( giExitBtnImage, L"", HELP_SCREEN_BTN_FONT, 
00581                                                                                      HELP_SCREEN_BTN_FONT_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00582                                                                                      HELP_SCREEN_BTN_FONT_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00583                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00584                                                                                      usPosX, usPosY, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00585                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnHelpScreenExitCallback );
00586       SetButtonFastHelpText( guiHelpScreenExitBtn, gzHelpScreenText[HLP_SCRN_TXT__EXIT_SCREEN] );
00587       SetButtonCursor( guiHelpScreenExitBtn, gHelpScreen.usCursor);
00588 
00589 
00590 
00591       //Create the buttons needed for the screen
00592       CreateHelpScreenButtons();
00593 
00594 
00595       //if there are buttons
00596       if( gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons != 0 )
00597             usPosX = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX + HELP_SCREEN_SHOW_HELP_AGAIN_REGION_OFFSET_X + HELP_SCREEN_BUTTON_BORDER_WIDTH;
00598       else
00599             usPosX = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX + HELP_SCREEN_SHOW_HELP_AGAIN_REGION_OFFSET_X;
00600 
00601       usPosY = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY + gHelpScreen.usScreenHeight - HELP_SCREEN_SHOW_HELP_AGAIN_REGION_OFFSET_Y;
00602 
00603       if( !gHelpScreen.fForceHelpScreenToComeUp)
00604       {
00605             gHelpScreenDontShowHelpAgainToggle = CreateCheckBoxButton( usPosX, (UINT16)(usPosY-3), 
00606                                                                                                             "INTERFACE\\OptionsCheckBoxes.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST, 
00607                                                                                                             BtnHelpScreenDontShowHelpAgainCallback );
00608 
00609             SetButtonCursor( gHelpScreenDontShowHelpAgainToggle, gHelpScreen.usCursor ); 
00610 
00611             // Set the state of the chec box
00612             if( gGameSettings.fHideHelpInAllScreens )
00613                   ButtonList[ gHelpScreenDontShowHelpAgainToggle ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00614             else
00615                   ButtonList[ gHelpScreenDontShowHelpAgainToggle ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00616       }
00617 
00618 /*
00619       ///creatre a region for the text that says ' [ x ] click to continue seeing ....'
00620       iStartLoc = HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE * HLP_TXT_CONSTANT_FOOTER;
00621       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(HELPSCREEN_FILE, zText, iStartLoc, HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE );
00622 
00623       usWidth = StringPixLength( zText, HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BODY_FONT );
00624       usHeight = GetFontHeight( HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BODY_FONT );
00625 
00626 /*
00627       MSYS_DefineRegion( &HelpScreenDontShowHelpAgainToggleTextRegion, usPosX, usPosY, (UINT16)(usPosX+usWidth), (UINT16)(usPosY+usHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST-1,
00628                                            gHelpScreen.usCursor, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, HelpScreenDontShowHelpAgainToggleTextRegionCallBack ); 
00629   MSYS_AddRegion( &HelpScreenDontShowHelpAgainToggleTextRegion ); 
00630 */
00631 
00632       // load the help screen background graphic and add it
00633       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00634       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\HelpScreen.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00635       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiHelpScreenBackGround));
00636 
00637 
00638       //create the text buffer
00639       CreateHelpScreenTextBuffer();
00640 
00641 
00642       //make sure we redraw everything
00643       gHelpScreen.ubHelpScreenDirty = HLP_SCRN_DRTY_LVL_REFRESH_ALL;
00644 
00645       //mark it that we have been in since we enter the current screen
00646       gHelpScreen.fHaveAlreadyBeenInHelpScreenSinceEnteringCurrenScreen = TRUE;
00647 
00648       //set the fact that we have been to the screen
00649       gHelpScreen.usHasPlayerSeenHelpScreenInCurrentScreen &= ~( 1 << gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreen );
00650 
00651       //always start at the top
00652       gHelpScreen.iLineAtTopOfTextBuffer = 0;
00653 
00654       //set it so there was no previous click
00655       gHelpScreen.iLastMouseClickY = -1;
00656 
00657       //Create the scroll box, and scroll arrow regions/buttons
00658       CreateScrollAreaButtons();
00659 
00660       //render the active page to the text buffer
00661       ChangeHelpScreenSubPage();
00662 
00663       //reset scroll box flag
00664       gfScrollBoxIsScrolling = FALSE;
00665 
00666       //reset first frame buffer
00667       gfHaveRenderedFirstFrameToSaveBuffer = FALSE;
00668 
00669       gubRenderHelpScreenTwiceInaRow = 0;
00670 
00671       return( TRUE );
00672 }
00673 
00674 void HandleHelpScreen()
00675 {
00676       //if any of the possible screens need to have a some code done every loop..  its done in here
00677       SpecialHandlerCode();
00678 
00679       if( gfScrollBoxIsScrolling )
00680       {
00681             if( gfLeftButtonState )
00682             {
00683                   HelpScreenMouseMoveScrollBox( gusMouseYPos );
00684             }
00685             else
00686             {
00687                   gfScrollBoxIsScrolling = FALSE;
00688                   gHelpScreen.iLastMouseClickY = -1;
00689             }
00690       }
00691 
00692       if( gubRenderHelpScreenTwiceInaRow < 3 )
00693       {
00694 //test
00695 //          gHelpScreen.ubHelpScreenDirty = HLP_SCRN_DRTY_LVL_REFRESH_ALL; 
00696 
00697             gubRenderHelpScreenTwiceInaRow++;
00698 
00699             UnmarkButtonsDirty( );
00700       }
00701 
00702       // refresh all of help screens buttons
00703       RefreshAllHelpScreenButtons();
00704 }
00705 
00706 void RenderHelpScreen()
00707 {
00708 //rrr
00709 
00710       if( gfHaveRenderedFirstFrameToSaveBuffer )
00711       {
00712             //Restore the background before blitting the text back on
00713             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX, gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY, gHelpScreen.usScreenWidth, gHelpScreen.usScreenHeight );
00714       }
00715 
00716 
00717       if( gHelpScreen.ubHelpScreenDirty == HLP_SCRN_DRTY_LVL_REFRESH_ALL )
00718       {
00719             //Display the helpscreen background
00720             DrawHelpScreenBackGround();
00721 
00722             //Display the current screens title, and footer info
00723             DisplayCurrentScreenTitleAndFooter();
00724       }
00725 
00726 
00727       if( !gfHaveRenderedFirstFrameToSaveBuffer )
00728       {
00729             gfHaveRenderedFirstFrameToSaveBuffer = TRUE;
00730 
00731             //blit everything to the save buffer ( cause the save buffer can bleed through )
00732             BlitBufferToBuffer(guiRENDERBUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX, gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY, (UINT16)(gHelpScreen.usScreenWidth), (UINT16)(gHelpScreen.usScreenHeight) );
00733             
00734             UnmarkButtonsDirty( );
00735       }
00736 
00737 
00738       //render the text buffer to the screen
00739       if( gHelpScreen.ubHelpScreenDirty >= HLP_SCRN_DRTY_LVL_REFRESH_TEXT )
00740       {
00741             RenderTextBufferToScreen();
00742       }
00743 }
00744 
00745 
00746 void ExitHelpScreen()
00747 {
00748       INT32 i;
00749 
00750       if( !gHelpScreen.fForceHelpScreenToComeUp )
00751       {
00752             //Get the current value of the checkbox
00753             if( ButtonList[ gHelpScreenDontShowHelpAgainToggle ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
00754             {
00755                   gGameSettings.fHideHelpInAllScreens = TRUE;
00756                   gHelpScreen.usHasPlayerSeenHelpScreenInCurrentScreen = 0;
00757             }
00758             else
00759             {
00760                   gGameSettings.fHideHelpInAllScreens = FALSE;
00761             }
00762 
00763             //remove the mouse region for the '[ ] dont show help...'
00764             RemoveButton( gHelpScreenDontShowHelpAgainToggle );
00765       }
00766 
00767 
00768       //mark it that the help screen is not active
00769       gHelpScreen.uiFlags &= ~HELP_SCREEN_ACTIVE;
00770 
00771       //remove the mouse region that blankets
00772       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gHelpScreenFullScreenMask );
00773 
00774       //checkbox to toggle show help again toggle
00775 //    MSYS_RemoveRegion( &HelpScreenDontShowHelpAgainToggleTextRegion );
00776       
00777 
00778       //remove the hepl graphic
00779       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiHelpScreenBackGround );
00780 
00781 
00782       //remove the exit button
00783       RemoveButton( guiHelpScreenExitBtn );
00784 
00785       //if there are any buttons, remove them
00786       if( gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons != 0 )
00787       {
00788             for( i=0; i< gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons; i++ )
00789             {
00790                   UnloadButtonImage( giHelpScreenButtonsImage[i] );
00791                   RemoveButton( guiHelpScreenBtns[i] );
00792             }
00793       }
00794 
00795       //destroy the text buffer for the help screen
00796       DestroyHelpScreenTextBuffer();
00797 
00798 
00799       //Handles the dirtying of any special screen we are about to reenter
00800       HelpScreenSpecialExitCode();
00801 
00802       //if the game was NOT paused
00803       if( gHelpScreen.fWasTheGamePausedPriorToEnteringHelpScreen == FALSE )
00804       {
00805             //un pause the game
00806             UnPauseGame( );
00807       }
00808 
00809       //Delete the scroll box, and scroll arrow regions/buttons
00810       DeleteScrollArrowButtons();
00811 
00812       //reset
00813       gHelpScreen.fForceHelpScreenToComeUp = FALSE;
00814 
00815       SaveGameSettings();
00816 }
00817 
00818 
00819 BOOLEAN DrawHelpScreenBackGround()
00820 {
00821   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00822       UINT16 usPosX;
00823 
00824       //Get and display the background image
00825       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiHelpScreenBackGround );
00826 
00827       usPosX = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX;
00828 
00829       //if there are buttons, blit the button border
00830       if( gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons != 0 )
00831       {
00832         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, HLP_SCRN_BUTTON_BORDER, usPosX, gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00833             usPosX += HELP_SCREEN_BUTTON_BORDER_WIDTH;
00834       }
00835 
00836   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, HLP_SCRN_DEFAULT_TYPE, usPosX, gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00837 
00838   InvalidateRegion( gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX, gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY, gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX+gHelpScreen.usScreenWidth, gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY + gHelpScreen.usScreenHeight );
00839 
00840       return( TRUE );
00841 }
00842 
00843 void SetSizeAndPropertiesOfHelpScreen()
00844 {
00845 
00846 
00847 //new screen:
00848       gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons = 0;
00849 
00850       //
00851       //these are the default settings, so if the screen uses different then defualt, set them in the switch
00852       //
00853       {
00854             gHelpScreen.usScreenWidth = HELP_SCREEN_DEFUALT_LOC_WIDTH;
00855             gHelpScreen.usScreenHeight = HELP_SCREEN_DEFUALT_LOC_HEIGHT;
00856 
00857             gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX = ( SCREEN_WIDTH - gHelpScreen.usScreenWidth ) / 2;
00858             gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY = ( SCREEN_HEIGHT - gHelpScreen.usScreenHeight ) / 2;
00859 
00860             gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage = 0;
00861 
00862                         gHelpScreen.usCursor = CURSOR_NORMAL;
00863       }
00864 
00865 
00866       switch( gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreen )
00867       {
00868             case HELP_SCREEN_LAPTOP:
00869                   gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons = HLP_SCRN_LPTP_NUM_PAGES;
00870                   gHelpScreen.usCursor = CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN;
00871 
00872                   //center the screen inside the laptop screen
00873                   gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX = LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + ( 502 - gHelpScreen.usScreenWidth ) / 2;
00874                   gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY = LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_Y + ( LAPTOP_SCREEN_HEIGHT - gHelpScreen.usScreenHeight ) / 2;
00875 
00876                   break;
00877             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN:
00878                   gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons = HLP_SCRN_NUM_MPSCRN_BTNS;
00879 
00880                   //calc the center position based on the current panel thats being displayed
00881                   gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY = ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gHelpScreen.usScreenHeight ) / 2;
00882                   break;
00883             case HELP_SCREEN_TACTICAL:
00884                   gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons = HLP_SCRN_NUM_TACTICAL_PAGES;
00885 
00886                   //calc the center position based on the current panel thats being displayed
00887                   gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY = ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gHelpScreen.usScreenHeight ) / 2;
00888                   break;
00889 
00890             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_NO_ONE_HIRED:
00891             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_NOT_IN_ARULCO:
00892             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_SECTOR_INVENTORY:
00893                   gHelpScreen.usScreenWidth = HELP_SCREEN_SMALL_LOC_WIDTH;
00894                   gHelpScreen.usScreenHeight = HELP_SCREEN_SMALL_LOC_HEIGHT;
00895 
00896                   //calc screen position since we just set the width and height
00897                   gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX = ( SCREEN_WIDTH - gHelpScreen.usScreenWidth ) / 2;
00898 
00899                   //calc the center position based on the current panel thats being displayed
00900                   gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY = ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gHelpScreen.usScreenHeight ) / 2;
00901 
00902                   gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons = 0;
00903                   gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage = 0;
00904                   break;
00905 
00906 
00907             case HELP_SCREEN_OPTIONS:
00908             case HELP_SCREEN_LOAD_GAME:
00909                   break;
00910 
00911             default:
00912                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00913                         AssertMsg( 0, "Error in help screen.  DF 0" );
00914       #else
00915         break;
00916                   #endif
00917       }
00918 
00919       //if there are buttons
00920       if( gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons != 0 )
00921             gHelpScreen.usLeftMarginPosX  = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX + HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_LEFT_MARGIN_WITH_BTN;
00922       else
00923             gHelpScreen.usLeftMarginPosX  = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX + HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_LEFT_MARGIN;
00924 
00925 }
00926 
00927 void CreateHelpScreenButtons()
00928 {
00929       UINT16 usPosX, usPosY;
00930       CHAR16      sText[1024];
00931       INT32 i;
00932 
00933       //if there are buttons to create
00934       if( gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons != 0 )
00935       {
00936 
00937             usPosX = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX + HELP_SCREEN_BTN_OFFSET_X;
00938             usPosY = HELP_SCREEN_BTN_OFFSET_Y + gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY;
00939 
00940 
00941             //loop through all the buttons, and create them
00942             for( i=0; i< gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons; i++ )
00943             {
00944                   //get the text for the button
00945                   GetHelpScreenText( gHelpScreenBtnTextRecordNum[ gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreen ].iButtonTextNum[i], sText );
00946 
00947 /*
00948                   guiHelpScreenBtns[i] = CreateTextButton( sText, HELP_SCREEN_BTN_FONT, HELP_SCREEN_BTN_FONT_COLOR, HELP_SCREEN_BTN_FONT_BACK_COLOR, 
00949                               BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT, usPosX, usPosY, HELP_SCREEN_BTN_WIDTH, HELP_SCREEN_BTN_HEIGHT, 
00950                               BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST, BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK, BtnHelpScreenBtnsCallback );
00951 */
00952 
00953 
00954                   giHelpScreenButtonsImage[i] = UseLoadedButtonImage( giExitBtnImage, -1,1,5,3,7 );
00955                   
00956                   guiHelpScreenBtns[i] = CreateIconAndTextButton( giHelpScreenButtonsImage[i], sText, HELP_SCREEN_BTN_FONT, 
00957                                                                                            HELP_SCREEN_BTN_FONT_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00958                                                                                            HELP_SCREEN_BTN_FONT_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00959                                                                                            TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00960                                                                                            usPosX, usPosY, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00961                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnHelpScreenBtnsCallback);
00962 
00963 
00964                   SetButtonCursor( guiHelpScreenBtns[i], gHelpScreen.usCursor);
00965                   MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiHelpScreenBtns[i], 0, i);
00966 
00967 //    SpecifyButtonTextOffsets( guiHelpScreenBtns[i], 19, 9, TRUE );
00968 
00969                   usPosY += HELP_SCREEN_BTN_HEIGHT + HELP_SCREEN_GAP_BN_BTNS;
00970             }
00971 
00972             ButtonList[ guiHelpScreenBtns[0] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00973       }
00974 }
00975 
00976 
00977 void  GetHelpScreenUserInput()
00978 {
00979       InputAtom Event;
00980       POINT  MousePos;
00981 
00982       GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
00983 
00984       while( DequeueEvent( &Event ) )
00985       {
00986             // HOOK INTO MOUSE HOOKS
00987             switch( Event.usEvent)
00988         {
00989                   case LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00990                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00991                         break;
00992                   case LEFT_BUTTON_UP:
00993                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y ,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);               
00994                         break;
00995                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00996                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00997                         break;
00998                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_UP: 
00999                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);   
01000                         break;
01001                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT: 
01002                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);                 
01003                         break;
01004                   case LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT: 
01005                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);                        
01006                         break;
01007             }
01008             
01009 
01010             if( !HandleTextInput( &Event ) && Event.usEvent == KEY_UP )
01011             {
01012                   switch( Event.usParam )
01013                   {
01014                         case ESC:
01015                               PrepareToExitHelpScreen();
01016                               break;
01017 
01018                         case DNARROW:
01019                         { 
01020                               ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( 1 );
01021                         }
01022                         break;
01023 
01024                         case UPARROW:
01025                         { 
01026                               ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( -1 );
01027                         }
01028                         break;
01029 
01030                         case PGUP:
01031                         { 
01032                               ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( -( HLP_SCRN__MAX_NUMBER_DISPLAYED_LINES_IN_BUFFER -1 ) );
01033                         }
01034                         break;
01035                         case PGDN:
01036                         { 
01037                               ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( ( HLP_SCRN__MAX_NUMBER_DISPLAYED_LINES_IN_BUFFER -1 ) );
01038                         }
01039                         break;
01040 
01041                         case LEFTARROW:
01042                               ChangeToHelpScreenSubPage( (INT8)( gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage - 1 ) ); 
01043                               break;
01044 
01045                         case RIGHTARROW:
01046                               ChangeToHelpScreenSubPage( (INT8)( gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage + 1 ) );
01047                               break;
01048 
01049 /*
01050 
01051                         case LEFTARROW:
01052                         { 
01053                         }
01054                               break;
01055 
01056                         case RIGHTARROW:
01057                         { 
01058                         }
01059                               break;
01060 */
01061 
01062 
01063 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01064                         //rerender the hepl screen
01065                         case 'r':
01066                               gHelpScreen.ubHelpScreenDirty = HLP_SCRN_DRTY_LVL_REFRESH_ALL;
01067                               break;
01068 
01069                         case 'i':
01070                               InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
01071                               break;
01072 
01073                         case 'd':
01074                           InvalidateRegion( gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX, gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY, gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX+gHelpScreen.usScreenWidth, gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY + gHelpScreen.usScreenHeight );
01075                               break;
01076 #endif
01077                   }
01078             }
01079 
01080             if( !HandleTextInput( &Event ) && Event.usEvent == KEY_REPEAT )
01081             {
01082                   switch( Event.usParam )
01083                   {
01084                         case DNARROW:
01085                         { 
01086                               ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( 1 );
01087                         }
01088                         break;
01089 
01090                         case UPARROW:
01091                         { 
01092                               ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( -1 );
01093                         }
01094                         break;
01095 
01096                         case PGUP:
01097                         { 
01098                               ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( -( HLP_SCRN__MAX_NUMBER_DISPLAYED_LINES_IN_BUFFER -1 ) );
01099                         }
01100                         break;
01101                         case PGDN:
01102                         { 
01103                               ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( ( HLP_SCRN__MAX_NUMBER_DISPLAYED_LINES_IN_BUFFER -1 ) );
01104                         }
01105                         break;
01106                   }
01107             }
01108       }
01109 }
01110 
01111 
01112 //Handles anything spcial that must be done when exiting the specific screen we are about to reenter ( eg. dirtying of the screen ) 
01113 void HelpScreenSpecialExitCode()
01114 {
01115       //switch on the current screen
01116       switch( gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreen )
01117       {
01118             case HELP_SCREEN_LAPTOP:
01119                   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
01120                   break;
01121 
01122             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_NO_ONE_HIRED:
01123             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_NOT_IN_ARULCO:
01124             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_SECTOR_INVENTORY:
01125             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN:
01126                   fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
01127                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
01128                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
01129                   fMapPanelDirty=TRUE;
01130                   break;
01131 
01132             case HELP_SCREEN_TACTICAL:
01133                   fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
01134                   SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
01135                   break;
01136 
01137             case HELP_SCREEN_OPTIONS:
01138                   break;
01139             case HELP_SCREEN_LOAD_GAME:
01140                   break;
01141 
01142             default:
01143                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01144                         AssertMsg( 0, "Error in help screen.  DF 0" );
01145       #else
01146         break;
01147                   #endif
01148       }
01149 }
01150 
01151 void PrepareToExitHelpScreen()
01152 {
01153       gfHelpScreenExit = TRUE;
01154 }
01155 
01156 
01157 //Handles anything special that must be done when exiting the specific screen we are about to reenter ( eg. dirtying of the screen ) 
01158 void SpecialHandlerCode()
01159 {
01160       //switch on the current screen
01161       switch( gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreen )
01162       {
01163             case HELP_SCREEN_LAPTOP:
01164                   PrintDate( );
01165                   PrintBalance( );
01166                   PrintNumberOnTeam( );
01167                   break;
01168             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN:
01169                   break;
01170             case HELP_SCREEN_TACTICAL:
01171                   break;
01172 
01173             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_NO_ONE_HIRED:
01174                   break;
01175             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_NOT_IN_ARULCO:
01176                   break;
01177             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_SECTOR_INVENTORY:
01178                   break;
01179                   break;
01180             case HELP_SCREEN_OPTIONS:
01181                   break;
01182             case HELP_SCREEN_LOAD_GAME:
01183                   break;
01184 
01185             default:
01186                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01187                         AssertMsg( 0, "Error in help screen:  SpecialHandlerCode().  DF 0" );
01188       #else
01189         break;
01190                   #endif
01191       }
01192 }
01193 
01194 
01195 UINT16 RenderSpecificHelpScreen()
01196 {
01197       UINT16      usNumVerticalPixelsDisplayed = 0;
01198 //new screen:
01199 
01200       //set the buffer for the text to go to
01201 //    SetFontDestBuffer( guiHelpScreenTextBufferSurface, gHelpScreen.usLeftMarginPosX, gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY + HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_OFFSET_Y,
01202 //                                                           HLP_SCRN__WIDTH_OF_TEXT_BUFFER, HLP_SCRN__NUMBER_BYTES_IN_TEXT_BUFFER, FALSE );
01203       SetFontDestBuffer( guiHelpScreenTextBufferSurface, 0, 0,
01204                                                              HLP_SCRN__WIDTH_OF_TEXT_BUFFER, HLP_SCRN__HEIGHT_OF_TEXT_BUFFER, FALSE );
01205 
01206 
01207       //switch on the current screen
01208       switch( gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreen )
01209       {
01210             case HELP_SCREEN_LAPTOP:
01211                   usNumVerticalPixelsDisplayed = RenderLaptopHelpScreen();
01212                   break;
01213             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN:
01214                   usNumVerticalPixelsDisplayed = RenderMapScreenHelpScreen();
01215                   break;
01216             case HELP_SCREEN_TACTICAL:
01217                   usNumVerticalPixelsDisplayed = RenderTacticalHelpScreen();
01218                   break;
01219             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_NO_ONE_HIRED:
01220                   usNumVerticalPixelsDisplayed = RenderMapScreenNoOneHiredYetHelpScreen();
01221                   break;
01222             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_NOT_IN_ARULCO:
01223                   usNumVerticalPixelsDisplayed = RenderMapScreenNotYetInArulcoHelpScreen();
01224                   break;
01225             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_SECTOR_INVENTORY:
01226                   usNumVerticalPixelsDisplayed = RenderMapScreenSectorInventoryHelpScreen();
01227                   break;
01228             case HELP_SCREEN_OPTIONS:
01229                   break;
01230             case HELP_SCREEN_LOAD_GAME:
01231                   break;
01232 
01233             default:
01234                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01235                         SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
01236                         AssertMsg( 0, "Error in help screen:  RenderSpecificHelpScreen().  DF 0" );
01237       #else
01238         break;
01239                   #endif
01240       }
01241 
01242       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
01243 
01244       //add 1 line to the bottom of the buffer
01245       usNumVerticalPixelsDisplayed += 10;
01246 
01247       return( usNumVerticalPixelsDisplayed );
01248 }
01249 
01250 void GetHelpScreenTextPositions( UINT16 *pusPosX, UINT16 *pusPosY, UINT16 *pusWidth )
01251 {
01252       //if there are buttons
01253       if( pusPosX != NULL )
01254             *pusPosX = 0;
01255 
01256       if( pusWidth != NULL )
01257             *pusWidth = HLP_SCRN__WIDTH_OF_TEXT_BUFFER - 1 * HELP_SCREEN_MARGIN_SIZE;           //DEF was 2
01258 
01259       if( pusPosY != NULL )
01260             *pusPosY = 0;
01261 }

01264 
01265 void DisplayCurrentScreenTitleAndFooter()
01266 {
01267       INT32 iStartLoc = -1;
01268       CHAR16      zText[1024];
01269       UINT16      usPosX=0, usPosY=0, usWidth=0;
01270 
01271 //new screen:
01272 
01273       //switch on the current screen
01274       switch( gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreen )
01275       {
01276             case HELP_SCREEN_LAPTOP:
01277                   iStartLoc = HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE * HLP_TXT_LAPTOP_TITLE;
01278                   break;
01279             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN:
01280                   iStartLoc = HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE * HLP_TXT_WELCOM_TO_ARULCO_TITLE;
01281                   break;
01282             case HELP_SCREEN_TACTICAL:
01283                   iStartLoc = HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE * HLP_TXT_TACTICAL_TITLE;
01284                   break;
01285             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_NO_ONE_HIRED:
01286                   iStartLoc = HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE * HLP_TXT_MPSCRN_NO_1_HIRED_YET_TITLE;
01287                   break;
01288             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_NOT_IN_ARULCO:
01289                   iStartLoc = HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE * HLP_TXT_MPSCRN_NOT_IN_ARULCO_TITLE;
01290                   break;
01291             case HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_SECTOR_INVENTORY:
01292                   iStartLoc = HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE * HLP_TXT_SECTOR_INVTRY_TITLE;
01293                   break;
01294             case HELP_SCREEN_OPTIONS:
01295                   break;
01296             case HELP_SCREEN_LOAD_GAME:
01297                   break;
01298 
01299             default:
01300                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01301                         AssertMsg( 0, "Error in help screen:  DisplayCurrentScreenTitleAndFooter().  DF 0" );
01302       #else
01303         break;
01304                   #endif
01305       }
01306 
01307 //    GetHelpScreenTextPositions( NULL, NULL, &usWidth );
01308 
01309       if( gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons != 0 )
01310             usWidth = gHelpScreen.usScreenWidth - HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_LEFT_MARGIN_WITH_BTN - HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_RIGHT_MARGIN_SPACE;
01311       else
01312             usWidth = gHelpScreen.usScreenWidth - HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_LEFT_MARGIN - HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_RIGHT_MARGIN_SPACE;
01313 
01314       //if this screen has a valid title
01315       if( iStartLoc != -1 )
01316       {
01317             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(HELPSCREEN_FILE, zText, iStartLoc, HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE );
01318 
01319             SetFontShadow( NO_SHADOW );
01320 
01321             usPosX = gHelpScreen.usLeftMarginPosX;
01322 
01323 //          DrawTextToScreen( zText, usPosX, (UINT16)(gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY+HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_OFFSET_Y), usWidth, 
01324 //                                                     HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_BODY_FONT, HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_BODY_COLOR, HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BACKGROUND, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
01325 
01326             //Display the Title
01327             IanDisplayWrappedString( usPosX, (UINT16)(gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY+HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_OFFSET_Y), usWidth, HELP_SCREEN_GAP_BTN_LINES, 
01328                                                                                      HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_BODY_FONT, HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_BODY_COLOR, zText, 
01329                                                                                      HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BACKGROUND, FALSE, 0 );
01330 
01331       }
01332 
01333       //Display the '( press H to get help... )'
01334       iStartLoc = HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE * HLP_TXT_CONSTANT_SUBTITLE;
01335       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(HELPSCREEN_FILE, zText, iStartLoc, HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE );
01336 
01337       usPosX = gHelpScreen.usLeftMarginPosX;
01338 
01339       usPosY = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY+HELP_SCREEN_HELP_REMINDER_Y;
01340 //    DrawTextToScreen( zText, usPosX, usPosY, usWidth, 
01341 //                                               HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BODY_FONT, HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_BODY_COLOR, HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BACKGROUND, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
01342 
01343 
01344       IanDisplayWrappedString( usPosX, usPosY, usWidth, HELP_SCREEN_GAP_BTN_LINES, 
01345                                                                                HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_BODY_FONT, HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_BODY_COLOR, zText, 
01346                                                                                HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BACKGROUND, FALSE, 0 );
01347 
01348       if( !gHelpScreen.fForceHelpScreenToComeUp )
01349       {
01350             //calc location for the ' [ x ] Dont display again...'
01351             iStartLoc = HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE * HLP_TXT_CONSTANT_FOOTER;
01352             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(HELPSCREEN_FILE, zText, iStartLoc, HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE );
01353 
01354             usPosX = gHelpScreen.usLeftMarginPosX + HELP_SCREEN_SHOW_HELP_AGAIN_REGION_TEXT_OFFSET_X;
01355 
01356             usPosY = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY + gHelpScreen.usScreenHeight - HELP_SCREEN_SHOW_HELP_AGAIN_REGION_TEXT_OFFSET_Y + 2;
01357 
01358 
01359             //Display the ' [ x ] Dont display again...'
01360             IanDisplayWrappedString( usPosX, usPosY, usWidth, HELP_SCREEN_GAP_BTN_LINES, 
01361                                                                                      HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BODY_FONT, HELP_SCREEN_TITLE_BODY_COLOR, zText, 
01362                                                                                      HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BACKGROUND, FALSE, 0 );
01363       }
01364 
01365       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
01366 }
01367 
01368 void BtnHelpScreenBtnsCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01369 {
01370       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01371       {
01372 //          btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01373             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01374       }
01375       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01376       {
01377             //Get the btn id
01378             INT8  bRetValue = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
01379 
01380             ChangeToHelpScreenSubPage( bRetValue );
01381 /*
01382             //change the current page to the new one
01383             gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage = ( bRetValue > gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons ) ? gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons-1 : bRetValue; 
01384 
01385             gHelpScreen.ubHelpScreenDirty = HLP_SCRN_DRTY_LVL_REFRESH_TEXT;
01386 
01387             for( i=0; i< gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons; i++ )
01388             {
01389                   ButtonList[ guiHelpScreenBtns[i] ]->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01390             }
01391 
01392             //change the current sub page, and render it to the buffer
01393             ChangeHelpScreenSubPage();
01394 */
01395             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01396 
01397             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01398 
01399       }
01400       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01401       {
01402 //          btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01403             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01404       }
01405 } 
01406 
01407 void ChangeToHelpScreenSubPage( INT8 bNewPage )
01408 {
01409       INT8 i;
01410 
01411       //if for some reason, we are assigning a lower number
01412       if( bNewPage < 0 )
01413       {
01414             gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage = 0;
01415       }
01416 
01417       //for some reason if the we are passing in a # that is greater then the max, set it to the max
01418       else if( bNewPage >= gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons )
01419       {
01420             gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage = ( gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons == 0 ) ? 0: gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons -1;
01421       }
01422 
01423       //if we are selecting the current su page, exit
01424       else if( bNewPage == gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage )
01425       {
01426             return;
01427       }
01428 
01429       //else assign the new subpage
01430       else
01431       {
01432             gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage = bNewPage;
01433       }
01434 
01435       //refresh the screen
01436       gHelpScreen.ubHelpScreenDirty = HLP_SCRN_DRTY_LVL_REFRESH_TEXT;
01437 
01438       //'undepress' all the buttons
01439       for( i=0; i< gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons; i++ )
01440       {
01441             ButtonList[ guiHelpScreenBtns[i] ]->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01442       }
01443 
01444       //depress the proper button
01445       ButtonList[ guiHelpScreenBtns[ gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01446 
01447       //change the current sub page, and render it to the buffer
01448       ChangeHelpScreenSubPage();
01449 }
01450 
01451 void GetHelpScreenText( UINT32 uiRecordToGet, STR16   pText )
01452 {
01453       INT32 iStartLoc = -1;
01454 
01455       iStartLoc = HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE * uiRecordToGet;
01456       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(HELPSCREEN_FILE, pText, iStartLoc, HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE );
01457 }
01458 
01459 //returns the number of vertical pixels printed
01460 UINT16 GetAndDisplayHelpScreenText( UINT32 uiRecord, UINT16 usPosX, UINT16 usPosY, UINT16 usWidth )
01461 {
01462       CHAR16      zText[1024];
01463       UINT16      usNumVertPixels = 0;
01464       UINT32 uiStartLoc;
01465 
01466       SetFontShadow( NO_SHADOW );
01467 
01468       GetHelpScreenText( uiRecord, zText );
01469 
01470       //Get the record
01471       uiStartLoc = HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE * uiRecord;
01472       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(HELPSCREEN_FILE, zText, uiStartLoc, HELPSCREEN_RECORD_SIZE );
01473 
01474       //Display the text
01475       usNumVertPixels = IanDisplayWrappedString( usPosX, usPosY, usWidth, HELP_SCREEN_GAP_BTN_LINES, 
01476                                                                                HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BODY_FONT, HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BODY_COLOR, zText, 
01477                                                                                HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BACKGROUND, FALSE, 0 );
01478 
01479       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
01480 
01481       return( usNumVertPixels );
01482 }

01537 void NewScreenSoResetHelpScreen( )

01543 
01544 void BtnHelpScreenExitCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01545 {
01546       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01547       {
01548             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01549             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01550       }
01551       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01552       {
01553             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01554 
01555             PrepareToExitHelpScreen();
01556 
01557             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01558       }
01559       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01560       {
01561             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01562             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01563       }
01564 } 
01565 
01566 
01567 UINT16 RenderLaptopHelpScreen()
01568 {
01569       UINT16      usPosX, usPosY, usWidth, usNumVertPixels;
01570       UINT8       ubCnt;
01571       UINT16      usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels=0;
01572       UINT16      usFontHeight = GetFontHeight( HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BODY_FONT );
01573 
01574 
01575       if( gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage == -1 )
01576       {
01577             return( 0 );
01578       }
01579 
01580       //Get the position for the text
01581       GetHelpScreenTextPositions( &usPosX, &usPosY, &usWidth );
01582 
01583       //switch on the current screen
01584       switch( gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage )
01585       {
01586             case HLP_SCRN_LPTP_OVERVIEW:
01587                   //Display all the paragraphs
01588                   for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<2; ubCnt++ )
01589                   {
01590                         //Display the text, and get the number of pixels it used to display it
01591                         usNumVertPixels = GetAndDisplayHelpScreenText( HLP_TXT_LAPTOP_OVERVIEW_P1+ubCnt, usPosX, usPosY, usWidth );
01592 
01593                         //move the next text down by the right amount
01594                         usPosY = usPosY+ usNumVertPixels + usFontHeight;
01595 
01596                         //add the total amount of pixels used
01597                         usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels += usNumVertPixels + usFontHeight;
01598                   }
01599 
01600 /*
01601                   //Display the first paragraph
01602                   usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels = GetAndDisplayHelpScreenText( HLP_TXT_LAPTOP_OVERVIEW_P1, usPosX, usPosY, usWidth );
01603 
01604                   usPosY = usPosY+ usNumVertPixels + GetFontHeight( HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BODY_FONT );
01605 
01606                   //Display the second paragraph
01607                   usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels += GetAndDisplayHelpScreenText( HLP_TXT_LAPTOP_OVERVIEW_P2, usPosX, usPosY, usWidth );
01608 */
01609                   break;
01610 
01611             case HLP_SCRN_LPTP_EMAIL:
01612 
01613                   //Display the first paragraph
01614                   usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels = GetAndDisplayHelpScreenText( HLP_TXT_LAPTOP_EMAIL_P1, usPosX, usPosY, usWidth );
01615                   break;
01616 
01617 
01618             case HLP_SCRN_LPTP_WEB:
01619 
01620                   //Display the first paragraph
01621                   usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels = GetAndDisplayHelpScreenText( HLP_TXT_LAPTOP_WEB_P1, usPosX, usPosY, usWidth );
01622 
01623                   break;
01624 
01625 
01626             case HLP_SCRN_LPTP_FILES:
01627 
01628                   //Display the first paragraph
01629                   usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels = GetAndDisplayHelpScreenText( HLP_TXT_LAPTOP_FILES_P1, usPosX, usPosY, usWidth );
01630                   break;
01631 
01632 
01633             case HLP_SCRN_LPTP_HISTORY:
01634                   //Display the first paragraph
01635                   usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels = GetAndDisplayHelpScreenText( HLP_TXT_LAPTOP_HISTORY_P1, usPosX, usPosY, usWidth );
01636 
01637                   break;
01638 
01639 
01640             case HLP_SCRN_LPTP_PERSONNEL:
01641 
01642                   //Display the first paragraph
01643                   usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels = GetAndDisplayHelpScreenText( HLP_TXT_LAPTOP_PERSONNEL_P1, usPosX, usPosY, usWidth );
01644                   break;
01645 
01646             case HLP_SCRN_LPTP_FINANCIAL:
01647                   //Display all the paragraphs
01648                   for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<2; ubCnt++ )
01649                   {
01650                         usNumVertPixels = GetAndDisplayHelpScreenText( HLP_TXT_FINANCES_P1+ubCnt, usPosX, usPosY, usWidth );
01651 
01652                         //move the next text down by the right amount
01653                         usPosY = usPosY+ usNumVertPixels + usFontHeight;
01654 
01655                         //add the total amount of pixels used
01656                         usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels += usNumVertPixels + usFontHeight;
01657                   }
01658 
01659                   break;
01660 
01661             case HLP_SCRN_LPTP_MERC_STATS:
01662                   //Display all the paragraphs
01663                   for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<15; ubCnt++ )
01664                   {
01665                         usNumVertPixels = GetAndDisplayHelpScreenText( HLP_TXT_MERC_STATS_P1+ubCnt, usPosX, usPosY, usWidth );
01666 
01667                         //move the next text down by the right amount
01668                         usPosY = usPosY+ usNumVertPixels + usFontHeight;
01669 
01670                         //add the total amount of pixels used
01671                         usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels += usNumVertPixels + usFontHeight;
01672                   }
01673 
01674                   break;
01675       }
01676 
01677       return( usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels );
01678 }

01680 
01681 UINT16 RenderMapScreenNoOneHiredYetHelpScreen()
01682 {
01683       UINT16      usPosX, usPosY, usWidth, usNumVertPixels;
01684       UINT8       ubCnt;
01685       UINT16      usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels=0;
01686       UINT16      usFontHeight = GetFontHeight( HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BODY_FONT );
01687 
01688 
01689       if( gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage == -1 )
01690       {
01691             return( 0 );
01692       }
01693 
01694       //Get the position for the text
01695       GetHelpScreenTextPositions( &usPosX, &usPosY, &usWidth );
01696 
01697       //switch on the current screen
01698       switch( gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage )
01699       {
01700             case HLP_SCRN_NO_ONE_HIRED:
01701 
01702                   //Display all the paragraphs
01703                   for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<2; ubCnt++ )
01704                   {
01705                         usNumVertPixels = GetAndDisplayHelpScreenText( HLP_TXT_MPSCRN_NO_1_HIRED_YET_P1+ubCnt, usPosX, usPosY, usWidth );
01706 
01707                         //move the next text down by the right amount
01708                         usPosY = usPosY+ usNumVertPixels + usFontHeight;
01709 
01710                         //add the total amount of pixels used
01711                         usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels += usNumVertPixels + usFontHeight;
01712                   }
01713 
01714                   break;
01715       }
01716 
01717       return( usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels );
01718 }

01720 
01721 UINT16 RenderMapScreenNotYetInArulcoHelpScreen()
01722 {
01723       UINT16      usPosX, usPosY, usWidth, usNumVertPixels;
01724       UINT8       ubCnt;
01725       UINT16      usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels=0;
01726       UINT16      usFontHeight = GetFontHeight( HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_BODY_FONT );
01727 
01728 
01729       if( gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage == -1 )
01730       {
01731             return( 0 );
01732       }
01733 
01734       //Get the position for the text
01735       GetHelpScreenTextPositions( &usPosX, &usPosY, &usWidth );
01736 
01737       //switch on the current screen
01738       switch( gHelpScreen.bCurrentHelpScreenActiveSubPage )
01739       {
01740             case HLP_SCRN_NOT_IN_ARULCO:
01741 
01742                   //Display all the paragraphs
01743                   for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<3; ubCnt++ )
01744                   {
01745                         usNumVertPixels = GetAndDisplayHelpScreenText( HLP_TXT_MPSCRN_NOT_IN_ARULCO_P1+ubCnt, usPosX, usPosY, usWidth );
01746 
01747                         //move the next text down by the right amount
01748                         usPosY = usPosY+ usNumVertPixels + usFontHeight;
01749 
01750                         //add the total amount of pixels used
01751                         usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels += usNumVertPixels + usFontHeight;
01752                   }
01753                   break;
01754       }
01755 
01756       return( usTotalNumberOfVerticalPixels );
01757 }

02066 
02067 void RefreshAllHelpScreenButtons()
02068 {
02069       UINT8 i;
02070 
02071             //loop through all the buttons, and refresh them
02072       for( i=0; i< gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons; i++ )
02073       {
02074             ButtonList[ guiHelpScreenBtns[i] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
02075       }
02076 
02077       ButtonList[ guiHelpScreenExitBtn ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
02078       
02079       if( !gHelpScreen.fForceHelpScreenToComeUp )
02080       {
02081             ButtonList[ gHelpScreenDontShowHelpAgainToggle ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
02082       }
02083 
02084       ButtonList[ giHelpScreenScrollArrows[0] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
02085       ButtonList[ giHelpScreenScrollArrows[1] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
02086 }
02087 
02088 
02089 
02090 INT8 HelpScreenDetermineWhichMapScreenHelpToShow()
02091 {
02092       if( fShowMapInventoryPool )
02093       {
02094             return( HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_SECTOR_INVENTORY );
02095       }
02096 
02097       if( AnyMercsHired() == FALSE )
02098       {
02099             return( HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_NO_ONE_HIRED );
02100       }
02101 
02102       if( gTacticalStatus.fDidGameJustStart )
02103       {
02104             return( HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN_NOT_IN_ARULCO );
02105       }
02106 
02107       return( HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN );
02108 }
02109 
02110 
02111 BOOLEAN CreateHelpScreenTextBuffer()
02112 {
02113       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
02114 
02115       // Create a background video surface to blt the face onto
02116       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
02117       vs_desc.usWidth = HLP_SCRN__WIDTH_OF_TEXT_BUFFER;
02118       vs_desc.usHeight = HLP_SCRN__HEIGHT_OF_TEXT_BUFFER;
02119       vs_desc.ubBitDepth = 16;
02120       CHECKF( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &guiHelpScreenTextBufferSurface) );
02121 
02122       return( TRUE );
02123 }
02124 
02125 void DestroyHelpScreenTextBuffer()
02126 {
02127       DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( guiHelpScreenTextBufferSurface );
02128 }
02129 
02130 void RenderCurrentHelpScreenTextToBuffer()
02131 {
02132       //clear the buffer ( use 0, black as a transparent color
02133       ClearHelpScreenTextBuffer();
02134 
02135       //Render the current screen, and get the number of pixels it used to display
02136       gHelpScreen.usTotalNumberOfPixelsInBuffer = RenderSpecificHelpScreen();
02137 
02138       //calc the number of lines in the buffer
02139       gHelpScreen.usTotalNumberOfLinesInBuffer = gHelpScreen.usTotalNumberOfPixelsInBuffer / ( HLP_SCRN__HEIGHT_OF_1_LINE_IN_BUFFER );
02140 }
02141 
02142 
02143 void RenderTextBufferToScreen()
02144 {
02145       HVSURFACE hDestVSurface, hSrcVSurface;
02146       SGPRect           SrcRect;
02147 
02148 
02149       GetVideoSurface( &hDestVSurface, guiRENDERBUFFER );
02150       GetVideoSurface( &hSrcVSurface, guiHelpScreenTextBufferSurface );
02151 
02152       SrcRect.iLeft = 0;
02153       SrcRect.iTop = gHelpScreen.iLineAtTopOfTextBuffer * HLP_SCRN__HEIGHT_OF_1_LINE_IN_BUFFER;
02154       SrcRect.iRight = HLP_SCRN__WIDTH_OF_TEXT_BUFFER;
02155       SrcRect.iBottom = SrcRect.iTop + HLP_SCRN__HEIGHT_OF_TEXT_AREA - ( 2 * 8 );
02156 
02157       BltVSurfaceUsingDD( hDestVSurface, hSrcVSurface, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, gHelpScreen.usLeftMarginPosX, ( gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY + HELP_SCREEN_TEXT_OFFSET_Y ), (RECT*)&SrcRect );
02158 
02159       DisplayHelpScreenTextBufferScrollBox();
02160 }
02161 
02162 void ChangeHelpScreenSubPage()
02163 {
02164       //reset
02165       gHelpScreen.iLineAtTopOfTextBuffer = 0;
02166 
02167       RenderCurrentHelpScreenTextToBuffer();
02168 
02169       //enable or disable the help screen arrow buttons
02170       if( gHelpScreen.usTotalNumberOfLinesInBuffer <= HLP_SCRN__MAX_NUMBER_DISPLAYED_LINES_IN_BUFFER )
02171       {           
02172             DisableButton( giHelpScreenScrollArrows[0] );
02173             DisableButton( giHelpScreenScrollArrows[1] );
02174       }
02175       else
02176       {           
02177             EnableButton( giHelpScreenScrollArrows[0] );
02178             EnableButton( giHelpScreenScrollArrows[1] );
02179       }
02180 }
02181 
02182 void ClearHelpScreenTextBuffer()
02183 {
02184       UINT32                                                             uiDestPitchBYTES;
02185       UINT8                                                              *pDestBuf;
02186 
02187       // CLEAR THE FRAME BUFFER
02188       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( guiHelpScreenTextBufferSurface, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
02189       memset(pDestBuf, 0, HLP_SCRN__HEIGHT_OF_TEXT_BUFFER * uiDestPitchBYTES );
02190       UnLockVideoSurface( guiHelpScreenTextBufferSurface );
02191       InvalidateScreen( );
02192 }
02193 
02194 
02195 
02196 // - is up, + is down
02197 void ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( INT32 iAmouontToMove )
02198 {
02199       //if we are moving up
02200       if( iAmouontToMove < 0 )
02201       {
02202             if( gHelpScreen.iLineAtTopOfTextBuffer + iAmouontToMove >= 0 )
02203             {
02204                   //if we can move up by the requested amount
02205                   if( ( gHelpScreen.usTotalNumberOfLinesInBuffer - gHelpScreen.iLineAtTopOfTextBuffer ) > iAmouontToMove )
02206                   {
02207                         gHelpScreen.iLineAtTopOfTextBuffer += iAmouontToMove;
02208                   }
02209 
02210                   //else, trying to move past the top
02211                   else
02212                   {
02213                         gHelpScreen.iLineAtTopOfTextBuffer = 0;
02214                   }
02215             }
02216             else
02217             {
02218                   gHelpScreen.iLineAtTopOfTextBuffer = 0;
02219             }
02220       }
02221 
02222       //else we are moving down
02223       else
02224       {
02225             //if we dont have to scroll cause there is not enough text
02226             if( gHelpScreen.usTotalNumberOfLinesInBuffer <= HLP_SCRN__MAX_NUMBER_DISPLAYED_LINES_IN_BUFFER )
02227             {
02228                   gHelpScreen.iLineAtTopOfTextBuffer = 0;
02229             }
02230             else
02231             {
02232                   if( ( gHelpScreen.iLineAtTopOfTextBuffer + HLP_SCRN__MAX_NUMBER_DISPLAYED_LINES_IN_BUFFER + iAmouontToMove ) <= gHelpScreen.usTotalNumberOfLinesInBuffer )
02233                   {
02234                         gHelpScreen.iLineAtTopOfTextBuffer += iAmouontToMove;
02235                   }
02236                   else
02237                   {
02238                         gHelpScreen.iLineAtTopOfTextBuffer = gHelpScreen.usTotalNumberOfLinesInBuffer - HLP_SCRN__MAX_NUMBER_DISPLAYED_LINES_IN_BUFFER;
02239                   }
02240             }
02241       }
02242 
02243 //    RenderCurrentHelpScreenTextToBuffer();
02244 
02245       gHelpScreen.ubHelpScreenDirty = HLP_SCRN_DRTY_LVL_REFRESH_TEXT;
02246 }
02247 
02248 
02249 
02250 void DisplayHelpScreenTextBufferScrollBox()
02251 {
02252       INT32 iSizeOfBox;
02253       INT32 iTopPosScrollBox=0;
02254   UINT8      *pDestBuf;
02255   UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
02256       UINT16 usPosX;
02257 
02258       if( gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons != 0 )
02259       {
02260             usPosX = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX + HLP_SCRN__SCROLL_POSX + HELP_SCREEN_BUTTON_BORDER_WIDTH;
02261       }
02262       else
02263       {
02264             usPosX = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX + HLP_SCRN__SCROLL_POSX;
02265       }
02266 
02267       //
02268       //first calculate the height of the scroll box
02269       //
02270 
02271       CalculateHeightAndPositionForHelpScreenScrollBox( &iSizeOfBox, &iTopPosScrollBox );
02272 
02273       //
02274       // next draw the box
02275       //
02276 
02277       //if there ARE scroll bars, draw the 
02278       if( !( gHelpScreen.usTotalNumberOfLinesInBuffer <= HLP_SCRN__MAX_NUMBER_DISPLAYED_LINES_IN_BUFFER ) )
02279       {
02280             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, usPosX, iTopPosScrollBox, usPosX+HLP_SCRN__WIDTH_OF_SCROLL_AREA,   iTopPosScrollBox+iSizeOfBox-1, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 227, 198, 88 ) ) );
02281 
02282             //display the line
02283             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
02284             SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
02285 
02286             // draw the gold highlite line on the top and left
02287             LineDraw(FALSE, usPosX, iTopPosScrollBox, usPosX+HLP_SCRN__WIDTH_OF_SCROLL_AREA, iTopPosScrollBox, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 235, 222, 171 ) ), pDestBuf);
02288             LineDraw(FALSE, usPosX, iTopPosScrollBox, usPosX, iTopPosScrollBox+iSizeOfBox-1, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 235, 222, 171 ) ), pDestBuf);
02289 
02290             // draw the shadow line on the bottom and right
02291             LineDraw(FALSE, usPosX, iTopPosScrollBox+iSizeOfBox-1, usPosX+HLP_SCRN__WIDTH_OF_SCROLL_AREA, iTopPosScrollBox+iSizeOfBox-1, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 65, 49, 6 ) ), pDestBuf);
02292             LineDraw(FALSE, usPosX+HLP_SCRN__WIDTH_OF_SCROLL_AREA, iTopPosScrollBox, usPosX+HLP_SCRN__WIDTH_OF_SCROLL_AREA, iTopPosScrollBox+iSizeOfBox-1, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 65, 49, 6 ) ), pDestBuf);
02293             
02294             // unlock frame buffer
02295             UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
02296       }
02297 }
02298 
02299 
02300 void CreateScrollAreaButtons()
02301 {
02302       UINT16 usPosX, usWidth, usPosY;
02303       INT32 iPosY, iHeight;
02304 
02305       if( gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons != 0 )
02306       {
02307             usPosX = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX + HLP_SCRN__SCROLL_POSX + HELP_SCREEN_BUTTON_BORDER_WIDTH;
02308       }
02309       else
02310       {
02311             usPosX = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX + HLP_SCRN__SCROLL_POSX;
02312       }
02313 
02314       usWidth = HLP_SCRN__WIDTH_OF_SCROLL_AREA;
02315 
02316       //Get the height and position of the scroll box
02317       CalculateHeightAndPositionForHelpScreenScrollBox( &iHeight, &iPosY );
02318 
02319             //Create a mouse region 'mask' the entrire screen
02320       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gHelpScreenScrollArea, usPosX, (UINT16)iPosY, (UINT16)(usPosX+usWidth), (UINT16)(iPosY+HLP_SCRN__HEIGHT_OF_SCROLL_AREA), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
02321                                            gHelpScreen.usCursor, SelectHelpScrollAreaMovementCallBack, SelectHelpScrollAreaCallBack ); 
02322   MSYS_AddRegion( &gHelpScreenScrollArea );
02323 
02324       guiHelpScreenScrollArrowImage[ 0 ] = LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\HelpScreen.sti", 14,10, 11, 12 ,13 );
02325       guiHelpScreenScrollArrowImage[ 1 ] = UseLoadedButtonImage( guiHelpScreenScrollArrowImage[ 0 ] ,19,15,16,17,18 );
02326 
02327       if( gHelpScreen.bNumberOfButtons != 0 )
02328             usPosX = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX + HLP_SCRN__SCROLL_UP_ARROW_X + HELP_SCREEN_BUTTON_BORDER_WIDTH;
02329       else
02330             usPosX = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocX + HLP_SCRN__SCROLL_UP_ARROW_X;
02331 
02332       usPosY = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY + HLP_SCRN__SCROLL_UP_ARROW_Y;
02333 
02334       //Create the scroll arrows
02335       giHelpScreenScrollArrows[ 0 ] = QuickCreateButton( guiHelpScreenScrollArrowImage[ 0 ], usPosX, usPosY,
02336                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
02337                                                             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnHelpScreenScrollArrowsCallback );
02338       MSYS_SetBtnUserData( giHelpScreenScrollArrows[0],0,0);
02339       SetButtonCursor( giHelpScreenScrollArrows[0], gHelpScreen.usCursor ); 
02340 
02341       usPosY = gHelpScreen.usScreenLocY + HLP_SCRN__SCROLL_DWN_ARROW_Y;
02342 
02343       //Create the scroll arrows
02344       giHelpScreenScrollArrows[ 1 ] = QuickCreateButton( guiHelpScreenScrollArrowImage[ 1 ], usPosX, usPosY,
02345                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
02346                                                             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnHelpScreenScrollArrowsCallback );
02347       MSYS_SetBtnUserData( giHelpScreenScrollArrows[1],0,1);
02348       SetButtonCursor( giHelpScreenScrollArrows[1], gHelpScreen.usCursor ); 
02349 }

02352 void DeleteScrollArrowButtons()
02353 {
02354       INT8 i;
02355       //remove the mouse region that blankets
02356       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gHelpScreenScrollArea );
02357 
02358       for( i=0; i<2; i++)
02359       {
02360             RemoveButton( giHelpScreenScrollArrows[ i ] );
02361             UnloadButtonImage( guiHelpScreenScrollArrowImage[ i ] );
02362       }
02363 }
02364 
02365 
02366 void CalculateHeightAndPositionForHelpScreenScrollBox( INT32 *piHeightOfScrollBox, INT32 *piTopOfScrollBox )
02367 {
02368       INT32 iSizeOfBox, iTopPosScrollBox;
02369       FLOAT dPercentSizeOfBox = 0;
02370       FLOAT dTemp=0;
02371 
02372       dPercentSizeOfBox = HLP_SCRN__MAX_NUMBER_DISPLAYED_LINES_IN_BUFFER / (FLOAT ) gHelpScreen.usTotalNumberOfLinesInBuffer;
02373 
02374       //if the # is >= 1 then the box is the full size of the scroll area
02375       if( dPercentSizeOfBox >= 1.0 )
02376       {
02377             iSizeOfBox = HLP_SCRN__HEIGHT_OF_SCROLL_AREA;
02378 
02379             //no need to calc the top spot for the box
02380             iTopPosScrollBox = HLP_SCRN__SCROLL_POSY;
02381       }
02382       else
02383       {
02384             iSizeOfBox = (INT32)( dPercentSizeOfBox * HLP_SCRN__HEIGHT_OF_SCROLL_AREA + 0.5 );
02385 
02386             //
02387             //next, calculate the top position of the box
02388             //
02389             dTemp = ( HLP_SCRN__HEIGHT_OF_SCROLL_AREA / ( FLOAT ) gHelpScreen.usTotalNumberOfLinesInBuffer ) * gHelpScreen.iLineAtTopOfTextBuffer;
02390 
02391             iTopPosScrollBox = (INT32)( dTemp +.5 ) + HLP_SCRN__SCROLL_POSY;
02392       }
02393 
02394       if( piHeightOfScrollBox != NULL )
02395             *piHeightOfScrollBox = iSizeOfBox;
02396 
02397       if( piTopOfScrollBox != NULL )
02398             *piTopOfScrollBox = iTopPosScrollBox;
02399 }
02400 
02401 
02402 void SelectHelpScrollAreaCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02403 { 
02404       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02405       {
02406       }
02407       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
02408       {
02409             gfScrollBoxIsScrolling = FALSE;
02410             gHelpScreen.iLastMouseClickY = -1;
02411       } 
02412       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02413       {
02414             gfScrollBoxIsScrolling = TRUE;
02415             HelpScreenMouseMoveScrollBox( pRegion->MouseYPos );
02416       } 
02417       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
02418       {
02419       } 
02420 
02421 }
02422 
02423 void SelectHelpScrollAreaMovementCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02424 {
02425       if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
02426       {
02427 //          InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
02428       }
02429       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
02430       {
02431       }
02432       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE )
02433       {
02434             if( gfLeftButtonState )
02435             {
02436                   HelpScreenMouseMoveScrollBox( pRegion->MouseYPos );
02437             }
02438       }
02439 } 
02440 
02441 void HelpScreenMouseMoveScrollBox( INT32 usMousePosY )
02442 {
02443       INT32 iPosY, iHeight;
02444       INT32 iNumberOfIncrements=0;
02445       FLOAT dSizeOfIncrement = ( HLP_SCRN__HEIGHT_OF_SCROLL_AREA / ( FLOAT ) gHelpScreen.usTotalNumberOfLinesInBuffer );
02446       FLOAT dTemp;
02447       INT32 iNewPosition;
02448 
02449       CalculateHeightAndPositionForHelpScreenScrollBox( &iHeight, &iPosY );
02450 
02451       if( AreWeClickingOnScrollBar( usMousePosY ) || gHelpScreen.iLastMouseClickY != -1 )
02452       {
02453             if( gHelpScreen.iLastMouseClickY == -1 )
02454                   gHelpScreen.iLastMouseClickY = usMousePosY;
02455 
02456             if( usMousePosY < gHelpScreen.iLastMouseClickY )
02457             {
02458 //                iNewPosition = iPosY - ( UINT16)( dSizeOfIncrement + .5);
02459                   iNewPosition = iPosY - ( gHelpScreen.iLastMouseClickY - usMousePosY );
02460 
02461             }
02462             else if( usMousePosY > gHelpScreen.iLastMouseClickY )
02463             {
02464 //                iNewPosition = iPosY + ( UINT16)( dSizeOfIncrement + .5);
02465                   iNewPosition = iPosY + usMousePosY - gHelpScreen.iLastMouseClickY;
02466             }
02467             else
02468             {
02469                   return;
02470             }
02471 
02472             dTemp = ( iNewPosition - iPosY ) / dSizeOfIncrement;
02473 
02474             if( dTemp < 0 )
02475                   iNumberOfIncrements = (INT32)( dTemp - 0.5 );
02476             else
02477                   iNumberOfIncrements = (INT32)( dTemp + 0.5 );
02478 
02479             gHelpScreen.iLastMouseClickY = usMousePosY;
02480 
02481 //          return;
02482       }
02483       else
02484       {
02485             //if the mouse is higher then the top of the scroll area, set it to the top of the scroll area
02486             if( usMousePosY < HLP_SCRN__SCROLL_POSY )
02487                   usMousePosY = HLP_SCRN__SCROLL_POSY;
02488 
02489             dTemp = ( usMousePosY - iPosY ) / dSizeOfIncrement;
02490 
02491             if( dTemp < 0 )
02492                   iNumberOfIncrements = (INT32)( dTemp - 0.5 );
02493             else
02494                   iNumberOfIncrements = (INT32)( dTemp + 0.5 );
02495       }
02496 
02497       //if there has been a change
02498       if( iNumberOfIncrements != 0 )
02499       {
02500             ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( iNumberOfIncrements );
02501       }
02502 }
02503 
02504 
02505 
02506 void BtnHelpScreenScrollArrowsCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02507 {
02508       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02509       {
02510             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02511             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02512       }
02513 
02514       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02515       {
02516             INT32 iButtonID = MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0);
02517 
02518             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02519 
02520             //if up
02521             if( iButtonID == 0 )
02522             {
02523                   ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( -1 );
02524             }
02525             else
02526             {
02527                   ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( 1 );
02528             }
02529 
02530             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02531       }
02532 
02533       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT )
02534       {
02535             INT32 iButtonID = MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0);
02536 
02537             //if up
02538             if( iButtonID == 0 )
02539             {
02540                   ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( -1 );
02541             }
02542             else
02543             {
02544                   ChangeTopLineInTextBufferByAmount( 1 );
02545             }
02546 
02547             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02548       }
02549 
02550 }
02551 
02552 
02553 BOOLEAN AreWeClickingOnScrollBar( INT32 usMousePosY )
02554 {
02555       INT32 iPosY, iHeight;
02556 
02557       CalculateHeightAndPositionForHelpScreenScrollBox( &iHeight, &iPosY );
02558 
02559       if( usMousePosY >= iPosY && usMousePosY < ( iPosY + iHeight ) )
02560             return( TRUE );
02561       else
02562             return( FALSE );
02563 }
